chapters.title: Chapter 6:  The Westwood
chapters.info: Avendoraldera, p. 73—Sapling cut from Avendesora, the Legendary Tree of Life. The tree was a gift from the Aiel to the people of Cairhien over a century ago. The tree was cut down by Laman Damodred, the King of Cairhien, twenty years ago. Laman's Sin, as this act is called, ended a century of peace with the Aiel and began the Aiel War. See also Avendesora; Damodred, Laman.
